title: 10/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, NBC's Rodney Harrison joins DP to discuss this weekend's matchup between the Patriots and Bucs. What advice would he give the Patriots this weekend. Kevin Millar of the MLB Network calls in to preview the playoffs. Who has the best chance to win the World Series at this point? And Seth Wickersham discusses his new book about the drama within the Patriots dynasty. What was the tough answer to get when digging deep on New England?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
